sub_title: MSCA Postdoctoral Fellow | Radiochemist | PET tracer development

projects.title: Imaging of Neuroinflammation in Neurodegenerative Diseases - INMiND
projects.description: The goal of INMiND is to identify novel biological targets of neuroinflammation for both diagnostic and therapeutic purposes and to translate this knowledge into clinical application and patient benefit. This aim will be achieved through carrying out collaborative research on molecular mechanisms that link neuroinflammation with neurodegeneration.
